title: India On The Way To Become $5 Trillion Economy: Finance Ministry - BW Businessworld
content: India On The Way To Become $5 Trillion Economy: Finance Ministry  BW Businessworld
description: Capital expenditure has been estimated to increase by 35.4 per cent to Rs 7.5 lakh crore in the budget for the current financial year with a view to give impetus to the economy affected by the epidemic through investment, , finance ministry, economy growth, nirmala sitharaman
